org.sakaiproject.conditions.api

Interface ConditionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GradebookConditionsProvider

    public interface ConditionProvider
    interface to specify the contract for a service to make conditions available to any other tool or service
    Author:
    Zach A. Thomas

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getData(String type, String context)
      make a request for information from the ConditionProvider
      Map<String,String> getEntitiesForContext(String contextId)
      return a Map of entities for the specified context where the context is a Sakai site id, and the entities are specific to the service this ConditionProvider represents, e.g. for the gradebook ConditionProvider, the entities will be the assignments for the specified context.
      Map<String,String> getEventToDomainClassMapping()
      get a Map of event names, e.g.
      String getId()
      just a unique name that each ConditionProvider can be accessed by

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        just a unique name that each ConditionProvider can be accessed by
        Returns:
        unique name of this ConditionProvider

      • getEntitiesForContext

        Map<String,String> getEntitiesForContext(String contextId)
        return a Map of entities for the specified context where the context is a Sakai site id, and the entities are specific to the service this ConditionProvider represents, e.g. for the gradebook ConditionProvider, the entities will be the assignments for the specified context.
        Parameters:
        contextId -
        Returns:

      • getEventToDomainClassMapping

        Map<String,String> getEventToDomainClassMapping()
        get a Map of event names, e.g. 'gradebook.updateItemScore' to the name of the class concerned with that event, e.g. 'org.sakaiproject.conditions.impl.AssignmentGrading'
        Returns:
        the names of events this ConditionProvider is concerned with, and the names of classes that correspond to those events

      • getData

        Map<String,String> getData(String type,
                         String context)
        make a request for information from the ConditionProvider
        Parameters:
        type - the name of the information you want back from the ConditionProvider
        context - a contextual key, such as an assignment id from the gradebook
        Returns:
        An arbitrary map of keys and values which can be used to evaluate rules
